daysUntilStale.title: Days Until Stale
daysUntilStale.description: Number of days of inactivity before an Issue or Pull Request becomes stale.

daysUntilClose.title: Days Until Close
daysUntilClose.description: Number of days of inactivity before an Issue or Pull Request with the stale label is closed.

onlyLabels.title: Only Labels
onlyLabels.description: Only issues or pull requests with all of these labels are check if stale.

exemptLabels.title: Exempt Labels
exemptLabels.description: Issues or Pull Requests with these labels will never be considered stale.

exemptProjects.title: Exempt Projects
exemptProjects.description: Set to true to ignore issues in a milestone.

exemptAssignees.title: Exempt Assignees
exemptAssignees.description: Set to true to ignore issues with an assignee.

staleLabel.title: Stale Label
staleLabel.description: Label to use when marking as stale.

markComment.title: Mark Comment
markComment.description: Comment to post when marking as stale.
markComment.default: This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

unmarkComment.title: Unmark Comment
unmarkComment.description: Comment to post when removing the stale label.

closeComment.title: Closed Comment
closeComment.description: Comment to post when closing a stale issue or pull request.

limitPerRun.title: Limit Per Run
limitPerRun.description: Limit the number of actions per hour.

only.title: Only
only.description: Limit to only issues or pulls requests.

description: A GitHub app that closes abandoned issues and pull requests

pulls.title: Pulls
pulls.description: Specify configuration settings that are specific to pull requests.

issues.title: Issues
issues.description: Specify configuration settings that are specific to issues.
